text: granthadavaralli kelavariddāre – allāhanalli nambike uḷḷavaru mattu nimagēnannu iḷisi koḍalāgideyō adaralli (kur‌ān‌nalli) hāgū tamage iḷisikoḍalāgiruvudaralli nambike uḷḷavaru. Avaru allāhaneduru vinayaśīlarāgiruttāre. Avaru allāhana vacanagaḷannu saṇṇa belege māruvudilla. Anthavarigāgi avara pratiphalavu avara oḍeyana (allāhana) baḷi ide. Khaṇḍitavāgiyū allāhanu kṣipravāgi vicāraṇe naḍesuvavanāgiddāne
